Item_BodyPractice_TaiXu.Desc: Energies left behind by the power of creation from the beginning of heaven and earth. This kind of peculiar essence is very hard to find nowadays.
Item_BodyPractice_TaiXu.Name: Item_BodyPractice_TaiXu

Item_BodyPractice_XuanTian.Desc: Energies left behind by the power of creation from the beginning of heaven and earth. This kind of peculiar essence is very hard to find nowadays.
Item_BodyPractice_XuanTian.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XuanTian

Item_BodyPractice_JieMie.Desc: Essence with the power of annihilation, can only be collected in a heavenly tribulation.
Item_BodyPractice_JieMie.Name: Item_BodyPractice_JieMie

Item_BodyPractice_JiuYang.Desc: The most condensed energy in the blazing sun, very difficult to collect.
Item_BodyPractice_JiuYang.Name: Item_BodyPractice_JiuYang

Item_BodyPractice_XuanYue.Desc: The most condensed energy in the freezing moon, very difficult to collect.
Item_BodyPractice_XuanYue.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XuanYue

Item_BodyPractice_TaiYang.Desc: Essence of the Sun, can only be collected at midday.
Item_BodyPractice_TaiYang.Name: Item_BodyPractice_TaiYang

Item_BodyPractice_TaiYin.Desc: Essence of the Moon, can only be collected at midnight.
Item_BodyPractice_TaiYin.Name: Item_BodyPractice_TaiYin

Item_BodyPractice_EXJin.Desc: One of the primordial essence of the Five Elements, can only be found in environments and items with very strong Metal element.
Item_BodyPractice_EXJin.Name: Item_BodyPractice_EXJin

Item_BodyPractice_EXMu.Desc: One of the primordial essence of the Five Elements, can only be found in environments and items with very strong Wood element.
Item_BodyPractice_EXMu.Name: Item_BodyPractice_EXMu

Item_BodyPractice_EXShui.Desc: One of the primordial essence of the Five Elements, can only be found in environments and items with very strong Water element.
Item_BodyPractice_EXShui.Name: Item_BodyPractice_EXShui

Item_BodyPractice_EXHuo.Desc: One of the primordial essence of the Five Elements, can only be found in environments and items with very strong Fire element.
Item_BodyPractice_EXHuo.Name: Item_BodyPractice_EXHuo

Item_BodyPractice_EXTu.Desc: One of the primordial essence of the Five Elements, can only be found in environments and items with very strong Earth element.
Item_BodyPractice_EXTu.Name: Item_BodyPractice_EXTu

Item_BodyPractice_Jin.Desc: One of the acquired essence of the Five Elements. They can be collected anywhere in the world if you just look for it.
Item_BodyPractice_Jin.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Jin

Item_BodyPractice_Mu.Desc: One of the acquired essence of the Five Elements. They can be collected anywhere in the world if you just look for it.
Item_BodyPractice_Mu.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Mu

Item_BodyPractice_Shui.Desc: One of the acquired essence of the Five Elements. They can be collected anywhere in the world if you just look for it.
Item_BodyPractice_Shui.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Shui

Item_BodyPractice_Huo.Desc: One of the acquired essence of the Five Elements. They can be collected anywhere in the world if you just look for it.
Item_BodyPractice_Huo.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Huo

Item_BodyPractice_Tu.Desc: One of the acquired essence of the Five Elements. They can be collected anywhere in the world if you just look for it.
Item_BodyPractice_Tu.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Tu

Item_BodyPractice_FengShuiLing.Desc: Essence that only slowly forms in places with the most exceptional Feng Shui.
Item_BodyPractice_FengShuiLing.Name: Item_BodyPractice_FengShuiLing

Item_BodyPractice_FengShuiSha.Desc: Essence that only slowly forms in places with the most horrible Feng Shui.
Item_BodyPractice_FengShuiSha.Name: Item_BodyPractice_FengShuiSha

Item_BodyPractice_Chun.Desc: Essence that naturally forms between heaven and earth as the seasons flow, representing the energies of sprouting in spring.
Item_BodyPractice_Chun.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Chun

Item_BodyPractice_Xia.Desc: Essence that naturally forms between heaven and earth as the seasons flow, representing the energies of florescence in summer.
Item_BodyPractice_Xia.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Xia

Item_BodyPractice_Qiu.Desc: Essence that naturally forms between heaven and earth as the seasons flow, representing the energies of deterioration in autumn.
Item_BodyPractice_Qiu.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Qiu

Item_BodyPractice_Dong.Desc: Essence that naturally forms between heaven and earth as the seasons flow, representing the energies of desolation in winter.
Item_BodyPractice_Dong.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Dong

Item_BodyPractice_YongYe.Desc: Mysterious essence that permeate the space between heaven and earth in the Polar Night. Their exact origin is unknown, as if do not belong to this world.
Item_BodyPractice_YongYe.Name: Item_BodyPractice_YongYe

Item_BodyPractice_JiaoLongYuanJing.Desc: Essence that contains Flood Dragon's mystery of life, which could be a great reference for Physical Cultivators.
Item_BodyPractice_JiaoLongYuanJing.Name: Item_BodyPractice_JiaoLongYuanJing

Item_BodyPractice_XiongFengYuanJing.Desc: Essence that contains Phoenix's mystery of life, which could be a great reference for Physical Cultivators.
Item_BodyPractice_XiongFengYuanJing.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XiongFengYuanJing

Item_BodyPractice_ZhuLongYuanJing.Desc: Essence that contains Torch Dragon's mystery of life, which could be a great reference for Physical Cultivators.
Item_BodyPractice_ZhuLongYuanJing.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ZhuLongYuanJing

Item_BodyPractice_GuShouJingXue.Desc: A drop of blood essence from the Ancient Beast, it contains the mystery of its powerful body.
Item_BodyPractice_GuShouJingXue.Name: Item_BodyPractice_GuShouJingXue

Item_BodyPractice_GuShouGuFen.Desc: Some powder made from bones of the Ancient Beast, it contains the mystery of its powerful body.
Item_BodyPractice_GuShouGuFen.Name: Item_BodyPractice_GuShouGuFen

Item_BodyPractice_DaYaoYuanJing.Desc: Essence inside the body of a monster with great cultivation, it may contain the secrets of Yaoguai's innately strong bodies.
Item_BodyPractice_DaYaoYuanJing.Name: Item_BodyPractice_DaYaoYuanJing

Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv1.Desc: Essence of pure vitality, it can be a great supplement to your body.
Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv1.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv1

Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv2.Desc: A wisp of the original intrinsic essence of postnatal lives.
Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv2.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv2

Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv3.Desc: Breath of life that naturally generate between heaven and earth. It is also the source of primordial lives.
Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv3.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ShengMingLv3

Item_BodyPractice_SiWang.Desc: After the death of a living being, part of its intrinsic life force will diffuse into heaven and earth, while the other part will transform into this substance.
Item_BodyPractice_SiWang.Name: Item_BodyPractice_SiWang

Item_BodyPractice_WuHui.Desc: Although the origin of this substance is obscure, it is also a concentration of all living beings' turbid energies, which embodied the profound mystery of reincarnation and changes.
Item_BodyPractice_WuHui.Name: Item_BodyPractice_WuHui

Item_BodyPractice_WuXing.Desc: A very peculiar essence, invisible and intangible, but truly exist. Can be extracted from ethereal items.
Item_BodyPractice_WuXing.Name: Item_BodyPractice_WuXing

Item_BodyPractice_XianDaoJingHua.Desc: Collective term for the products of all kinds of essence in the world being processed with Qi by Golden Core cultivators. Due to the infusion of Qi, these essence are ineffective to Physical cultivators. If one forcefully use these essence to Remold body, it will cause the cultivation progress of the designated body part to nullify due to the Qi repulsion effect, reversing it to its original state.
Item_BodyPractice_XianDaoJingHua.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XianDaoJingHua

Item_BodyPractice_XianSui.Desc: Essence of the Immortal Body formed by a Golden Core cultivator. The extremely strong effect of this substance will create an intense stimulation in Physical cultivators. It's not known what might happen if one uses it for Remolding.
Item_BodyPractice_XianSui.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XianSui

Item_BodyPractice_ShenSui.Desc: Essence of the Divine Body formed by a Shendao cultivator. The extremely strong effect of this substance will create an intense stimulation in Physical cultivators. It's not known what might happen if one uses it for Remolding.
Item_BodyPractice_ShenSui.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ShenSui

Item_BodyPractice_BaBao.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of universe.
Item_BodyPractice_BaBao.Name: Item_BodyPractice_BaBao

Item_BodyPractice_WanDao.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the creation of cosmos.
Item_BodyPractice_WanDao.Name: Item_BodyPractice_WanDao

Item_BodyPractice_QiQing.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of Yin and Yang.
Item_BodyPractice_QiQing.Name: Item_BodyPractice_QiQing

Item_BodyPractice_ZhouTian.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the derivation of time.
Item_BodyPractice_ZhouTian.Name: Item_BodyPractice_ZhouTian

Item_BodyPractice_XuanYang.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of beginning and end.
Item_BodyPractice_XuanYang.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XuanYang

Item_BodyPractice_Jian.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of life and death.
Item_BodyPractice_Jian.Name: Item_BodyPractice_Jian

Item_BodyPractice_LingYu.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the thriving of beings.
Item_BodyPractice_LingYu.Name: Item_BodyPractice_LingYu

Item_BodyPractice_WanGu.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the nullification of time.
Item_BodyPractice_WanGu.Name: Item_BodyPractice_WanGu

Item_BodyPractice_XuanCi.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the desolation of cosmos.
Item_BodyPractice_XuanCi.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XuanCi

Item_BodyPractice_QiSha.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of the obliteration of beings.
Item_BodyPractice_QiSha.Name: Item_BodyPractice_QiSha

Item_BodyPractice_XuanYin.Desc: In the beginning, at the creation of cosmos, everything evolves. This is the essence manifested from the evolution of the ways of creation and formation.
Item_BodyPractice_XuanYin.Name: Item_BodyPractice_XuanYin
